name: Fruity Collection
description:
This is my first dual game.   In the first part of the game you're either collecting apples or ants.  In the second part, you're moving through a maze to collect keys to escape the maze.  Watch out for some "visitors", though.

Controls

Part 1 is the arrow keys

Part 2 is WASD and Z

Also, there are some areas of the game where there are slight flashes of light.  If that kind of thing bothers you, please don't play this game.
